New Records: Anthony Davis scored 31 points and 14 rebounds for the Lakers.
Brandon Ingram led the Pelicans with 32 points.
Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht made two game-winning free throws.
The Lakers won the game despite being down by three points with seconds left.
Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers entered the game on a four-game win streak.
The Pelicans were dealing with several key player injuries.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at the Smoothie King Center in Louisiana.
Others: Player performances and game events were detailed in the play-by-play summary.
